text: Desk Set is a 1957 American romantic comedy movie directed by Walter Lang and based on the 1955 play of the same name by William Marchant. It stars Spencer Tracy, Katharine Hepburn, Gig Young, Joan Blondell, Dina Merrill and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * Category:1957 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Walter Lang Category:20th Century Fox movies
title: Desk Set
